reference.shortdesc: The change-revisionid element specifies a string to identify the change.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The change-revisionid element is specialized from data. It is defined in the release-management domain module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows how the change-revisionid element can be used to identify a particular change. In this example, change revision ID is used to note the release number for which the first change is applicable.
example.codeblock: <change-historylist> <change-item product="productA productB"> <change-person>Tom Cihak</change-person> <change-revisionid>r23.4</change-revisionid> <change-completed>2019-07-20</change-completed> <change-summary>Made change 3 to both products</change-summary> <data>Details of change 3</data> </change-item> </change-historylist>
